website_summaries.verdict: This 19-function multi-tool provides decent tools and comes with a tire patch kit.
pros: Includes hex, chain breaker, spoke wrenches, and other tools you need to repair a standard bike
Compact and more affordable than comparable models
cons: Comes with a case that isn't large enough to also fit the patch kit

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds the Crank Bros m19
customer_reviews.text: I returned the Crank Bros m19 and got this instead and I'm very happy with the choice. The flask/case thingy that comes with the Crank Bros tool is a PIA to open, you need a tool just to open your tool case. This comes with a simple little pouch and it also includes a little tin filled with tire patches that you can slide ride into the loop on the back of the pouch. It's exactly what I wanted and otherwise identical to the Crank Bros tool. Don't pay more for less, get this one.
customer_reviews.author: ThrowinStacks

customer_reviews.title: Handy but heavy
customer_reviews.text: The pros: the tools stay together and most emergency tools for a bike are there. The cons: more awkward to use then individual tools and it's relatively heavy mostly because it has more tools then you need.
customer_reviews.author: dms

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait until I actually used it before saying anything. Used the chain breaker today while changing my chain. Worked fine, but there isn't much to grip on for leverage. What I don't like much is that all of the other tools tend to move around when you are using a particular one. Makes it a bit of a mess when using a single key. Still keep in my saddle bag for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier S.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Didn’t really work for me
customer_reviews.text: Pros: small size, different tools and sizes. Cons: patch kit doesn’t fit in case and is super small so you can lose it. When I went to use it, the handle flexed. Also the shaft of the tools are relatively short and you have to have it extend completely to use it so it was awkward in the space I had to get it to work. It’s just ok and I think that it will break/bend the next time I need to apply any kind of tork on it. I should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great company! Immediately sent a replacement due to one bent Allen wrench on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add: Vibrelli sent me an email asking if my item had arrived and if I was satisfied. When I explained the situation, they immediately apologised and sent me a replacement. Wonderful customer service! I had purchased this multitool and it arrived yesterday. It was a bit heavier than I expected, however, I thought it would be sturdy. As I was explaining it and showing it to my mom, I realized that the next-to-smallest Allen wrench was bent at the halfway mark. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S

customer_reviews.title: Compact and of excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice multitool, it includes a chain tool, it's very compact, and it comes with a nice patch (with belt loop). Other multitools have better-designed flat wrench tools, but these will be okay in a pinch. It feels heavier than you might think, but it is indeed exactly 6.5 oz (184 g) and that is lighter than many similar multitools. The bonus patch kit is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: A very high-quality tool that does not take up much space and isn't bulky. I previously had a similar tool (another brand) that would literally fall apart while I was using it. The end screws would come loose and that was my main fear in trying another one. Very pleased that after using this tool a bit, the end screws have not moved or loosened at all - super! The matte finish on the sides (helps grip) and the included case are nice touches too. Overall, awesome quality, perfect size/weight, and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: minnzo

customer_reviews.title: As described but case doesn't fit it all
customer_reviews.text: Very handy tool-- used it on the first day. It's true that the tools don't lock into place, but that's standard for most multi tools so it's not too much of a surprise or bother for quick repairs. Haven't used the patch kit yet. My one criticism is that the case only fits the multi tool, not the patch kit. Arrived on time and was much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis N. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little multi-tool but the overall functionality isn't great. It's good for making minor adjustments on certain spots. But it's bulky and the tools aren't long enough to make a standard turn.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: The Vibrelli bicycle multi-tool is a very good value. As a matter of fact I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The Vibrelli bicycle multi-tool is a very good value. As a matter of fact I had bought one previously and never got to use it because I have misplaced it somewhere, I was so impressed with the quality of the Vibrelli that I bought a second one. I just got it last week and used it to remove the chain from my road bike and it worked real slick. I also tried it on some spokes on my two bikes and it fit well. The device contains many other tools that I'm sure will come in handy in the future. I highly recommend the Vibrelli Bike Multi Tool!!! Also with Prime delivery was in the usual two days.
customer_reviews.author: WMass 37

customer_reviews.title: Useful on singletrack rides, due to 8mm wrench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily because of its dedicated 8mm allen wrench. Most other bike tools have an 8mm adaptor that slips on around a 6mm wrench, and I find them a pain to use. This tool fits well in my under-seat tool bag, and has already come in handy on a few rides, for re-tightening cranks, etc. I am buying a second one, for my son’s tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Leake

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid tool to keep in your bag while riding
customer_reviews.text: The quality and build of this tool is solid. It’s perfect for emergency roadside repairs. The only other “must have tool” (besides a pump) that I have to carry at all times is a set of tire levers. The only surprise I had was the weight. It’s a little heavier than I thought it would be, probably because it’s all metal, but it honestly doesn’t bother me. It feels like it’s built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Pasquale 61

customer_reviews.title: Handy on the trail!
customer_reviews.text: This compact bike tool is lightweight, and includes varying Allen wrenches in seven sizes, spoke wrenches and screwdrivers all in a convenient carry case. The only problem I had with it was the Phillips screwdriver got a little wobbly when I was adjusting my brakes, but overall I’m glad it’s part of my bicycle tool kit. I also own a Vibrelli tire pump with gauge and it’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: AdamKnowsBest

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: I actually did not have a chance to properly use this tool. I bought a cheaper bags that came unzipped on my last ride and this multitool came out. So, someone will have a nice multitool if they ever find it on the trail. I had one use out of it and that was to remove a Phillips head screw from a lamp for a friend. Worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jo L.

customer_reviews.title: High quality feel, fit, and finish
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking tool. Fit and finish appear to be high quality. This has a little weight to it, likely because it is all stainless steel. Since this a "use on road in an emergency" tool, I have not tested the durability yet (especially the chain breaker), but the initial impression is that it should hold up nicely. Packaging is very nice and nearly gift quality. Included was a patch kit and a nice pouch for the tool.
customer_reviews.author: G.J.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: This product fell apart after one ride.
customer_reviews.text: While riding and this was in my flat bag. It fell apart and into many pieces. When I put it back togather and put lock tight on the bolts that got it togather it still came to pieces. I would not buy this product again or recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Mayhall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I picked mine up to take on longer rides on my fat bike. The tool feels sturdy and high quality, with no excessive play in between the different pieces. The included patch kit is a nice addition, but the best part is the little carrying case; you can use it to also carry some master links and some brake pads. Definitely a great alternative to some of the pricier options available!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrelli Multi-Tool Stands Above the Rest
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for working with my new electric bike. The tool had each individual piece of hardware I needed all on one handy, well built piece of cold hard steel! lol You can truly feel that it's different from other multi-tools when you first hold it in your hands and feel it's weight and ridgitiy. It's solid, can handle tough torquing assignments, and it has all the tools a biker would commonly need too. This is a high quality multi-tool, that you'll be sure to have in your equipment bag for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Beauchemin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: This little tool has helped me out of a couple of binds even tho I've only had it a short amount of time. Very sturdy and easy to use, I don't feel like I'm going to bend it when tightening up my bike(s). I'll most likely buy more to gift to biking friends as its been so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Erik E. Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the chain breaker works!
customer_reviews.text: 3 years later and finally got to use the chain breaker so I thought I’d leave a review. Of course the hex tools work, but I always had my doubts about the chain breaker. It worked exactly like it was supposed to. Broke my current chain and sized my new chain with no problem. A little hard to get pressure since it is small and hard to get leverage, but I don’t plan on buying a stand alone chain breaker. Would buy again if I loose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. I’m a casual biker, but when I got out it’s usually with my wife and my two young kids — and there’s always something that I need to do with the tool. It has everything. Indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rand

customer_reviews.title: Has everything I need and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a multi-tool to do a small bit of work on my bike, including replacing the seat and adjusting the bicycle handlebar stem. This tool had everything I needed and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: No Whites Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great multi tool, has most everything you would need on a ride. Has saved me on the trail far to many times. Only improvement would be a way to attach the case to bike. It does have belt loop type strap on back but who wears a belt biking. I zip tied it to back of seat and seat post which is alright but could be much better if it had velcro or other kind of straps to attach to bike. Overall very satisfied and glad I've had it on rides.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K

customer_reviews.title: Quality and will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: I think I can count on this tool to help me in the future if I ever need it. Seems very well made, and durable. It's ridiculously heavy for the size, if you are a weight weenie then leave this tool at home. I'm gonna take it everywhere I go on my bike because one day I might need it and I know I can count on it to adjust or tighten something on my bike. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Johan Bach-Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality...
customer_reviews.text: Once you decide what tool will work for your bike (it takes a little effort) you are set to order. It comes in a nice canvas holder with some simple tire patches. What I chose has all the tools I'll need to make simple roadside repairs. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the set!
customer_reviews.text: This will be great in the pack! Nice having all the basic tools in one place without having to run back and forth to the tool box. No twisting...good torque...not too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Crossedsword

customer_reviews.title: Tire Patches and No Bike Tool!?  That's Pretty Bad!
customer_reviews.text: I received the shipment in a standard, undamaged amazon.com envelope. Inside was a torn cardboard box indicating that its contents were the multi-tool and tire patches. Inside the cardboard box were some very unimpressive patches and no multi-tool. Clearly a major mistake, but I'll just say, "Do not use this seller," then "Do not use amazon.com". I should have given it five stars for "light weight".
customer_reviews.author: DAVID REDMAN

customer_reviews.title: Vibrelli bike multi-tool V19
customer_reviews.text: Received the item quickly and it was securely packaged. I have not used it yet, but having it in hand and playing with for a while, it appears to be well-made, it should be useful, it's compact/lightweight, has the glueless tire repair patches and comes in a nice nylon pouch. RECOMMEND, and if anything changes, I'll revisit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Good tool - no tube patches
customer_reviews.text: The tool works as described. It'll put out a fire when needed. I also did not receive the tube patches that are in the picture of the product as other buyers stated. I took a star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t send me the patch kit:(
customer_reviews.text: I really love the tool but I didn’t receive the tire patch kit that the description says comes with it. Maybe they are no longer including that as a bonus but if so you should change your product pictures so buyers aren’t expecting something they aren’t getting - i believe that’s called false advertising. Tool is great, would be a full 5 stars if I got everything they said was coming with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson Childers

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, quality product
customer_reviews.text: My only knock on this is it's a bit small, but that's exactly as advertised. If you're OK with the size, then they are well worth the price. The magnets are a key feature and they work well. They erase just like any other dry eraser we have. The funny thing is that I bought these to protect our good erasers from being stolen by co-workers, and it turns out we use these more now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Herman

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a generic tool that needed a bit of fuss to get the right tools. This little guy changed that. Very sturdy and discreetly thin enough to fit in a full saddlebag.
customer_reviews.author: Rando Mando

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally. A multi-tool with a usable wrench. This tool is well made and compact. It's lightweight considering the strength and not cheap feeling. Great tool! Chain breaker, wrenches, allen's, spokes, etc.... Smart!
customer_reviews.author: Juan in Chattanooga

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good, but started rusting after first ride in a light drizzle
customer_reviews.text: The bolts holding it together have come loose, but that's easy to retighen. I have never had a tool with this type of design that that didn't happen to so no big whoop. The rust though is concerning to me.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This multi-tool has been awesome for what I purchased it for - to adjust the seat as needed, until I found a place it fit comfortably. As I venture further, I'm sure it'll be needed for maintenance and whatnot, but for now, it is fine. Great little kit at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Great value and construction
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the construction and durability. Folds up nice and compact and isn't super heavy. I doubt it will ever need replacing provided I don't lose it somehow.
customer_reviews.author: bklyn74

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Got my multi tool today, made well but missing the tire patch kit as pictured in the Amazon ad. I sent Vibrelli an email and they are sending me the kit .....they said the kit no longer comes with the tool but when I purchased it was the day they took it out. The tool itself is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Strumwasser

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy not built flimsy.  Seems sturdy but like to flip around and such while trying to use.
customer_reviews.text: Its good for a multi tool. It's kinda clunky to use and doesnt really handle the greatest it likes to flop around alot and parts move unnecessarily when trying to use but it works and that's all I need. The chain tool is kinda of a pain to figure out at first but it does just fine
customer_reviews.author: rossjohnsonprp

customer_reviews.title: Tough tool, good price
customer_reviews.text: I am a new cyclist, but I have been using hand tools regularly for 30 years. The product is well built and the tolerances are tight. I took it on a weekend trip using several of the tools so far. I am pleased with my ability to apply pressure and to spin quickly as needed. Very nice that a sleeve is included, that way the tool doesn't rattle against other metallic items it is packed with. Would buy it again if I ever lose it.
customer_reviews.author: J Mawhinney

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in under seat bag.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used this yet, but seems to have everything I will need for a possible road side emergency repair. The carry sleeve is a nice touch and the glueless patches included are a good bonus.
customer_reviews.author: John Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for emergencies on the road and hope I don't need it, but it seems to be a good quality tool. It's very compact and fits easily in a small top tube storage bag with my phone, wallet, and keys. I can see how it could be a little annoying if other tools get in the way while using one as they all rotate freely, but it's hard to knock it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for my emergency bag
customer_reviews.text: So far no complaints. It fits in my under-seat emergency bag and has worked the handful of time I’ve used it.
customer_reviews.author: BennyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: like the rest of the tool
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need for a standard bike. Haven't used the chain breaker yet, but it looks well made, like the rest of the tool. Haven't used the patches yet but they come in a small case to keep them safe. Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Way better than carrying all the separate tools
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Way better than carrying all the separate tools. Frees up a lot of space in my bike bag. The only reason I don't love it, is that it is very heavy. I have not had any other multi tools, and they may all be this heavy, so if they are I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Fenton

customer_reviews.title: It does what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic bike compact tool kit. Single tools are better, but they get lost. I have used this already to move stuff on my handlebars. It does what it is supposed to do and that is what tools are for.
customer_reviews.author: Charliep

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on a bike I've been overhauling. This tools is pretty nice and the chain breaker worked better than the one that came with the chain I bought. I would recommend this tool to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jamitz

customer_reviews.title: Good tool...will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good tool...just a little heavy to carry when ridding. Tool is better than no tool when you need. Zurdito.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Garza

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool set
customer_reviews.text: Tool delivered on time and as described. Pretty well put together tool, very compact, seems pretty rugged and has most commonly used attachments that fit my needs for the bike I have.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Modes are fantastic. Bright is a s bright does. I like the flexible mounting system.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tool with Pouch
customer_reviews.text: Some may not need the extra bonus of a carry pouch & patches, but they are an added value that I did not expect. Tool seem to be well made and holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a good tool!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tool that was more sturdy than the other cheap bicycle repair tools. This one is very similar to the CrankBros, but at a lower price. It has all the tools you need for simple repairs while out riding. It is made entirely of metal and seems like it would take some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Southernjoel

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for keeping on your bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty tool - it is small and light, and so far has had the right attachments for the adjustments I've needed to do while riding. It isn't a substitute for a full set of tools and some of the attachments are a little fiddly to use but it's robustly made and is great for keeping on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several multi function bike tools. This is by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: B-Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Just used for first time; used to remove and replace bike parts plus tighten some things the assembler missed. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: All covereed in review.
customer_reviews.text: A great tool and very sturdy. Fits all but one allen screw on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Blaha

customer_reviews.title: Good price but just a little heavy.
customer_reviews.text: A good price for a well made versatile bike tool that works very well. Just a little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Lynard Skynard

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I am planning on adding a rubber band to it to keep the rest of the tools out of the way when I am using it. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: MikeInMurphy

customer_reviews.title: office Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Office Christmas part quick gift for secret Santa, being a cyclist he really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very compact design. Lightweight with full assortment of basic tools.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a bit loose. Once tightened up using another set of allen keys, it performs nicely. Good arrangement of basic tools. Chain tool works well. Very compact design.
customer_reviews.author: Hungsicle

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool to upgrade my kit. I was going on a 62 mile ride in the middle of nowhere. Well my chain broke during the ride and I would have been up the creek without a paddle, or in this case a chain. The chain tool worked great!! I fixed the chain and was back on the bike in 5 minutes! I'm sooo thankful I bought this tool !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t opened it yet, but super excited to have for my mtb kit to hit SoCal trails this yr!!! Looks great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vbcoastalsoul

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Half the the price of my crank brothers tool and quality
customer_reviews.author: m murray

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this project is quite good.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this project is quite good, but unfortunately the Wrenches can't be locked, but the problem is not very important.
customer_reviews.author: Man Asura

customer_reviews.title: Tools fold in while in use
customer_reviews.text: I think it has more tools than I'll need while on the go. I wished there was more friction between the tool and the housing to stop the tool from folding when being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The cost is very low compared to the quality. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang - Small Bucks
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy and exactly what you need in a multitool. The item was exactly as pictured and the tools move well. Very compact and light weight. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Zat A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Multitool
customer_reviews.text: Over all, this is the best tool to have on a bike ride. It has come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Shoop

customer_reviews.title: Solid & useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it yet but appears to be a very useful multi tool to carry on a bike ride. The case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: wwhi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly handy tool. All the tools I typically need in a small package
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reed

customer_reviews.title: Tool Rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida where it is humid. This tool rode around in my bike pack for less than two weeks and got rusty, I never even got it wet. Very poor quality to rust that fast.
customer_reviews.author: mntwin

customer_reviews.title: This one in particular is not only excellent for the ride
customer_reviews.text: As is always the case for these folks, they provide innovative, compact/lightweight devices for the cycling community. This one in particular is not only excellent for the ride, but also a very good tool to just have around the house. Very nice work!
customer_reviews.author: nanaskds

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Have owned a few bike tools, wasn't expecting the quality this tool has. Haven't used chain tool yet.
customer_reviews.author: D. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: A must have for long trail days
customer_reviews.text: Well made multitool. Just a good as crankbrothers if not better because it’s almost half the price. The case is just what I needed!! to keep it from beating up my mini pump in my pack riding rough trails.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It a real tool.
customer_reviews.text: Quality compact multitool. The little case is a nice added touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared with this small and versatile tool.
customer_reviews.text: Must have tool if you bike any distance and don't want a small repair to ruin your trip. Compact, lightweight, yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Have used them for years. Not the lightest but one of the best
customer_reviews.author: ron arnott

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Feels weird and bulky in hand when trying to use. Becomes "loose" causing the bits to open flop around when using. Making for a frustrating trailside fix.
customer_reviews.author: Todd P.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built tool
customer_reviews.text: Solid feeling, very compact tool. Should be all you would need in a breakdown. High marks, I would recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Rolonmascara

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycle tool
customer_reviews.text: This has all the tools I need to fix my bike on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Has everything I need.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tool, in a nice little pouch. Has everything I need. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very useful and goes with me on every ride.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Plentl

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. The pouch included straps easily to the bike for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Small & light
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use yet, but the tool is small & light so easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Simms

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking tool
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking tool. It was bought to go in pack for emergencies so hopefully it works well too.
customer_reviews.author: note

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tools that easily fit in a saddle bag. Don't leave home without them.
customer_reviews.author: RonG

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Compact and has everything you could need while you are out on the road. I was worried about cheap construction but not the case
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size with all the tools I may need to do a road side repair. I have not tried the glueless patches so I can't comment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool to have with you. Had to replace chain on trail and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Koosharem gal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small, lightweight, but heavy duty multi tool and I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: ... now a couple of times and it has worked great. It is very small and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Have had to use it now a couple of times and it has worked great. It is very small and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and on time
customer_reviews.text: Tool is of high quality and works well. The chain tool split my 10 speed chain without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Harry L. Spatz

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool with a case
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool with a case. I needed a second one for a different bike, and this is nice and light but has all the tools. Haven't had to use it yet but good to have.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.text: For my bike . have all the important to work on my bike. Easy to work on my bike

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool!
customer_reviews.text: I got it this week and I have used it two times!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool for cyclists
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat this multi tool came in really handy. I carry it in my bike bag for emergencies whiles riding. Sturdy and reliable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good size and weight, all the tools you could need included. Just add the tire levers

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother in law who loves cycling. He was really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Solid, compact tool
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good tool which is well made. Comes with a pouch which is a nice bonus. All the usual tools.
customer_reviews.author: D. Keifer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy on the expensive side for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made, I have not use it very much so far, but lightweight and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: A must have for mountain biking, have most of the essential tools needed

product_meta.title: Vibrelli Bike Multi Tool - Performance Bicycle Multitool
product_meta.description:
Intelligent Design

We field tested dozens of designs to perfect this performance bike multi tool. 
Designed for both road and mountain biking, this tool will be your sidekick both on and off the trail. 
Non-slip textured sidebars give you grip in the wet. 

Performance Bike Tools


 *  Materials: Precision Hardened CrV Steel
 * Sidebar: Non-Slip Matte Aluminum
 * Length: 3"
 * Width: 0.8-1.9"
 * Profile: 0.5"
 * Weight: 3.1-6.5 oz

Warranty: Lifetime Manufacturer’s Warranty
feature_bullets: 19 PRECISION BIKE TOOLS: Hex (2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8), Universal Chain Breaker Tool, Spoke Wrenches (M7, M9, 3.3mm, 3.45mm), Open Wrenches (8mm,10mm) Phillips Screwdrivers (#1,#2), flat (#2), Torx (t-25), With Non-Slip Sidebar Grips.
SLIMLINE PROFILE: Length: 3”, Width: 2”, and weighing just 6.5oz, it’s easy to take anywhere
DESIGNED TO LAST: Made from Hardened High-Tensile Cr-V Steel,
100% SATISFACTION WARRANTY: We've built the Vibrelli Bike Multitool to last, which is why it comes with a Lifetime Manufacturer's Warranty.
